pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, October 22, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Mayor of Halifax, Mike Savage.

1:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit Couleur Chocolat, a small business located in Sainte-Anne-des-Monts, with Minister of National Revenue Diane Lebouthillier.

1:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit BestLifeRewarded Innovations, a small business located in Oakville, with Member of Parliament for Oakville North—Burlington Pam Damoff.

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually visit a Canadian history class at Institut collégial Vincent Massey Collegiate in Winnipeg with Member of Parliament for Winnipeg South Centre Jim Carr.

Closed to media.

Media Appearance

11:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on OMNI News: Filipino Edition.
